channel.title: 🏢 Reichman University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Reichman University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Advancing Fine-Grained Classification by Structure and Subject Preserving Augmentation
item.description: SaSPA, a novel data augmentation method, boosts fine-grained visual classification accuracy by generating diverse, class-consistent synthetic images using structural and subject-preserving techniques.
